sentence.Network_en: They cited Alex's refusal to return to the marital home.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们引证了亚历克斯拒绝回到婚后的家中一事。

sentence.Network_en: Their refusal to compromise will inevitably invite more criticism from the UN.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们拒绝妥协必然会引发联合国的更多批评。

sentence.Network_en: I couldn't tell if his refusal to talk was simple stubbornness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不清楚他拒绝说话是否只是因为他的顽固不化。

entry.def: Someone's refusal to do something is the fact of them showing or saying that they will not do it, allow it, or accept it.

example.ex: His letter in response to her request had contained a firm refusal.
example.tran: 对于她的请求他在信中给予了坚决的回绝。

entry.def: If someone has first refusal on something that is being sold or offered, they have the right to decide whether or not to buy it or take it before it is offered to anyone else.

example.ex: If you have a good rapport with a dealer, they will always let you have first refusal on anything interesting...
example.tran: 如果你和经销商关系好，好东西他们会任你先挑。

example.ex: A tenant may have a right of first refusal if a property is offered for sale.
example.tran: 若房产要出售，承租人可以有优先购买权。

means.word_mean: 2. a message refusing to accept something that is offered

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词"人,物,状态"; 2. 地方; 3. 表形容词,"……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: mur墙壁+al人,物,状态→adj.墙壁的 n.壁画
riv=river+al人,物,状态→竞争
affection爱;感情+al……的→adj.情感上的,爱情的
agriculture农业+al……的→adj.农业的,农艺的
clinic临床+al……的→adj.临床的,病房用的
con共同+gen出生+it+al……的→与生俱来
continent大陆+al……的→adj.大陆的,大陆性的

Sentence.sentence: Its refusal to sponsor the 1984 Olympics.

sentences.en: The plan was doomed to fail by their refusal to give it any financial support.
sentences.cn: 由于他们拒绝给予任何资助, 该计划注定要失败。

sentences.en: If you ever decide to sell your car, please give me the first refusal of it.
sentences.cn: 如果你决定把汽车卖掉, 请给我优先购买权。
